resource.description: Represents a single exchange of currency

attribute.name: base-amount
attribute.comment: The amount of the base currency paid or received.
Amount is signed from the point of view of the domain, so a positive number represents the customer paying, domain receiving and vice versa.

attribute.name: base-fee
attribute.comment: The amount of the base currency charged as fee to the customer account.
Amount is signed from the point of view of the domain, so a positive number represents the customer paying, domain receiving and vice versa.

attribute.name: counter-amount
attribute.comment: The amount of the counter currency paid or received.
Amount is signed from the point of view of the domain, so a positive number represents the customer paying, domain receiving and vice versa.

attribute.name: counter-fee
attribute.comment: The amount of the counter currency charged as fee to the customer account.
Amount is signed from the point of view of the domain, so a positive number represents the customer paying, domain receiving and vice versa.

attribute.name: closing
attribute.comment: Whether block is the closing side of a customer roll or drawdown. False if not present.

attribute.name: settled
attribute.comment: Whether block has been settled. True if not present.

relationship.name: transaction
relationship.comment: The transaction this block formed part of
